title: Bartenura Wine Library | Bartenura
text: Made with love in Italy Bartenura wines are made from the finest grapes grown throughout Italy’s famed wine regions. From the Iconic “Blue Bottle Moscato” to our classic Sangiovese “Rosso d’Italia”, Bartenura Wines are made with Italy’s centuries old tradition of making wine with passion and dedication to ensure the best in every bottle for wines that pair perfectly with good food and friends!
